info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Old Lady
collection.openText: She was so talkative before, yet in the end, loneliness was the only listener.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When an Abnormality other than $0 was worked with, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When the Qliphoth Counter reached 0, black shapes formed inside the Containment Unit. We’ve decided to dub these shapes “solitude” based on the condition in which they form.
When the solitude piled up, it stuck to #0 when they entered the Containment Unit.
#0 had to deal with continuous WHITE damage until the solitude eventually fell off. Until it was gone, they could not move or do any work.
